sentences.english: She was so satiated with chocolates that she would not even look at one.
sentences.chinese: 她對巧克力厭膩到連看都不想看。

sentences.english: However, once this time, but also a time when a man gradually satiation .
sentences.chinese: 然而，一旦到了這個時候，也是男人逐漸厭膩的時候。

sentences.english: The West is sated with debt, the East with plant.
sentences.chinese: 西方厭膩債務，東方厭倦工廠。
